subject: Police
lead_paragraph: Murray State quarterback Jeff Ehrhardt was charged with pushing a campus police officer and taking his ticket book in what the athletic director called “a prank gone bad.” Ehrhardt, 20, was arrested Wednesday and charged with second-degree robbery, which carries a potential prison term of up to 10 years. According to the police report, Ehrhardt said he was bet $20 he would not take such an action against the officer.
